Title: Welcome Screen Display
Definition: The application shall display a welcome screen with current date and time when first launched by the user.
Notes: Improves user experience and confirms application startup

Title: Theme Selection
Definition: Users shall be able to select from light, dark, and high contrast color themes through the settings menu.
Notes: Accessibility requirement for different user preferences
Remarks: Must maintain contrast ratios per WCAG guidelines

Title: File Processing Speed
Definition: The system shall process text files up to 1MB in size within 5 seconds including word count, character count, and paragraph analysis.
Remarks: Larger files may require background processing
Compliance Notes: Works for files under 500KB, optimization needed

Title: Export Functionality
Definition: Users shall be able to export analysis results in CSV, JSON, and PDF formats through the export menu.
Notes: Multiple format support for different use cases
Remarks: PDF export requires additional formatting library
Verification Notes: Verified file integrity and format compliance

Title: Preference Persistence
Definition: The application shall automatically save user preferences locally and restore them upon application restart.
Notes: Improves user experience by maintaining settings
Remarks: Uses local browser storage for web version

Title: Context Help Tooltips
Definition: The application shall display context-sensitive help tooltips when users hover over interface elements for more than 2 seconds.
Notes: Provides just-in-time assistance without cluttering UI
Remarks: Tooltip delay should be configurable in advanced settings
